1a1('bum): (cha) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2('bum): (黃) 大般若經第六部
1b1('bum): @##/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gcig pa/ 'di
1b2('bum): ltar nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
1b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid/ nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
1b4('bum): des na/ gang 'di nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di
1b5('bum): ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa
1b6('bum): nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
1b7('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su
1b8('bum): byas pa'o/ /'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa
2a1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
2a2('bum): des na/ gang 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
2a3('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya
2a4('bum): ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid/ chen
2a5('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/
2a6('bum): 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes
2a7('bum): pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar
2a8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
2b1('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
2b2('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
2b3('bum): gang 'di 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
2b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba
2b5('bum): de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid
2b6('bum): kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di
2b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma
2b8('bum): yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dor ba
3a1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid
3a2('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs
3a3('bum): su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma
3a4('bum): skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
3a5('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
3a6('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang
3a7('bum): gzhan ma yin ste/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di myi dmyigs
3a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa
3b1('bum): stong pa nyid/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /
3b2('bum): 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
3b3('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan
3b4('bum): ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di
3b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma
3b6('bum): skyes pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnams grangs des na/ gang 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes
3b7('bum): bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams/ yang dag
3b8('bum): par spong ba rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
4a1('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
4a2('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
4a3('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams/ dbang po rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dbang po rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /
4a4('bum): 'di ltar stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang stobs rnams/ stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/
4a5('bum): gang 'di stobs rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang byang chub
4a6('bum): kyi yan lag rnams/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs
4a7('bum): su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i
4a8('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di
4b1('bum): ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
4b2('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes
4b3('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams/ bsam gtan rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di bsam gtan rnams shes
4b4('bum): bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams/ tshad myed pa rnams
4b5('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di tshad myed pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
4b6('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
4b7('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar
4b8('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
5a1('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par thar pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/
5a2('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
5a3('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
5a4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa/
5a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
5a6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
5a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas
5a8('bum): pa'o/ /'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
5b1('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma
5b2('bum): skyes pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed
5b3('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams/
5b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams/ shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i
5b5('bum): grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa
5b6('bum): ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di myi 'jigs pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan
5b7('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
5b8('bum): grangs des na/ gang 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar byams pa chen po yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma
6a1('bum): yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di byams pa chen po shes bya ba de ni
6a2('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang ma skyes
6a3('bum): pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di snying rje chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan
6a4('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
6a5('bum): grangs des na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang
6a6('bum): gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
6a7('bum): 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
6a8('bum): 'bras bu/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas
6b1('bum): pa'o/ /'di ltar phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
6b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin
6b3('bum): te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /
6b4('bum): 'di ltar rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang byang chub/ rang byang chub nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di
6b5('bum): rang byang chub ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes
6b6('bum): pa nyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di
6b7('bum): ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/
6b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
7a1('bum): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe/
7a2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du shes kyi ma
7a3('bum): skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myig gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par
7a4('bum): dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
7a5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi ma
7a6('bum): skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sgra'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dri'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
7a7('bum): ro'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ reg gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam
7a8('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
7b1('bum): slad du/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi rnam
7b2('bum): par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes
7b3('bum): pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam
7b4('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi
7b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
7b6('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i 'dus te reg
7b7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi 'dus te
7b8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
8a1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ mye'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
8a2('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa
8a3('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
8a4('bum): slad du/ mying dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
8a5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ len pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar
8a6('bum): 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa mthong
8a7('bum): bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
8a8('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam
8b1('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu
8b2('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyi nang stong pa
8b3('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
8b4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
8b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ thog ma
8b6('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang bzhin stong
8b7('bum): pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma
8b8('bum): skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa
9a1('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa
9a2('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar
9a3('bum): 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
9a4('bum): slad du/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'phags pa'i
9a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bsam gtan
9a6('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
9a7('bum): kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
9a8('bum): kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
9b1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma
9b2('bum): skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa
9b3('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin
9b4('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par
9b5('bum): dag pa'i slad du/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
9b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos
9b7('bum): kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong
9b8('bum): bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu
10a1('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dgra
10a2('bum): bcom pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
10a3('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
10a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar
10a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyi don shes pa ltar na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes la/ tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ 'du shes
10a6('bum): kyang ma skyes pa/ 'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ myig kyang ma skyes la/ rna ba yang ma skyes pa/ sna yang ma skyes pa/ lce yang ma skyes pa/ lus kyang ma skyes pa/ yid kyang ma skyes pa/ gzugs
10a7('bum): kyang ma skyes la/ sgra yang ma skyes pa/ dri yang ma skyes pa/ ro yang ma skyes pa/ reg kyang ma skyes pa/ chos kyang ma skyes pa/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ sna'i
10a8('bum): rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i 'dus
10b1('bum): te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
10b2('bum): kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ lus
10b3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ sa'i khams kyang ma skyes la/ chu'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ mye'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/
10b4('bum): rlung gi khams kyang ma skyes pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ ma rig pa yang ma skyes la/ 'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ mying
10b5('bum): dang gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ skye mched drug kyang ma skyes pa/ reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ sred pa yang ma skyes pa/ len pa yang ma skyes pa/ srid pa yang ma skyes pa/ skye ba yang ma
10b6('bum): skyes pa/ rga shi yang ma skyes pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
10b7('bum): phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma skyes pa/ nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes la/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ phyi nang stong pa
10b8('bum): nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ don dam stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ma
11a1('bum): skyes pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/
11a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma
11a3('bum): skyes pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ dbang
11a4('bum): po rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang ma skyes pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma
11a5('bum): skyes la/ bsam gtan bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang ma skyes pa/ mthar kyis
11a6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang ma skyes pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang ma skyes pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ ting nge 'dzin
11a7('bum): rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang ma skyes pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/
11a8('bum): byams pa chen po yang ma skyes pa/ snying rje chen po yang ma skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma skyes pa/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes
11b1('bum): pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ so so'i skye bo yang ma skyes pa/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang ma skyes pa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/
11b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang ma skyes pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ phyir myi 'ong ba yang ma skyes pa/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ dgra bcom pa yang ma skyes pa/ dgra bcom pa'i
11b3('bum): chos kyang ma skyes pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyang
11b4('bum): ma skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa yin na/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar gal te/ gzugs kyang skye ba myed la/ tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ 'du shes kyang skye ba myed/ 'du byed kyang skye ba myed/
11b5('bum): rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ myig kyang skye ba myed la/ rna ba yang skye ba myed/ sna yang skye ba myed/ lce yang skye ba myed/ lus kyang skye ba myed/ yid kyang skye ba myed/ gzugs kyang skye ba myed la/
11b6('bum): sgra yang skye ba myed/ dri yang skye ba myed/ ro yang skye ba myed/ reg kyang skye ba myed/ chos kyang skye ba myed/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ sna'i
11b7('bum): rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed la/
11b8('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/
12a1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/
12a2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ sa'i khams kyang
12a3('bum): skye ba myed la/ chu'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ mye'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ rlung gi khams kyang skye ba myed/ nam mkha'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ ma rig
12a4('bum): pa yang skye ba myed la/ 'du byed kyang skye ba myed/ rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ mying dang gzugs kyang skye ba myed/ skye mched drug kyang skye ba myed/ reg pa yang skye ba myed/ tshor ba yang skye ba myed/
12a5('bum): sred pa yang skye ba myed/ len pa yang skye ba myed/ srid pa yang skye ba myed/ skye ba yang skye ba myed/ rga shi yang skye ba myed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang skye ba myed la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
12a6('bum): phyin pa yang skye ba myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang skye ba myed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang skye ba myed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang skye ba myed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
12a7('bum): pa yang skye ba myed/ nang stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed la/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ stong pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/
12a8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
12b1('bum): nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ myi dmyigs pa
12b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang skye ba myed
12b3('bum): la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang skye ba myed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ dbang po rnams kyang skye ba myed/ stobs rnams kyang skye ba myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang skye ba myed/
12b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang skye ba myed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang skye ba myed la/ bsam gtan rnams kyang skye ba myed/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ gzugs
12b5('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang skye ba myed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
12b6('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang skye ba myed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang skye ba myed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang skye ba myed/ de bzhin gshegs
12b7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyang skye ba myed/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang skye ba myed/ byams pa chen po yang skye ba myed/ snying rje chen po yang skye ba myed/ sangs rgyas
12b8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang skye ba myed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang skye ba myed la/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ so so'i
13a1('bum): skye bo yang skye ba myed la/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang skye ba myed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang skye ba myed/ lan cig phyir 'ong
13a2('bum): ba'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ phyir myi 'ong ba yang skye ba myed/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ dgra bcom pa yang skye ba myed/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ rang sangs rgyas kyang skye ba myed/ rang
13a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba myed/ byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba myed/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ sangs rgyas kyang skye ba myed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba myed na ni/ nyan thos
13a4('bum): kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
13a5('bum): pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha
13a6('bum): myi dad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na/ ci'i phyir na/ rgyun tu
13a7('bum): zhugs pas ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spong ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lam bsgoms/ phyir myi 'ong bas ni/ dam pa ma
13a8('bum): yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni/ rang
13b1('bum): byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod/ ci'i phyir na/
13b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
13b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud pa yod par myi 'dod de/ ma skyes
13b4('bum): pa la rgyun tu zhugs pa yod par myi 'dod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par myi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par myi 'dod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par myi 'dod do/ /
13b5('bum): ma skyes pa la phyir myi 'ong ba yod par myi 'dod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par myi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par myi 'dod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par myi 'dod do/ /
13b6('bum): ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par myi 'dod do/ /rang byang chub yod par myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod
13b7('bum): par myi 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis myi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na/ sems
13b8('bum): can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i don bya bar myi nus kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas/
14a1('bum): sems can grangs myed tshad myed pa'i don bya ba de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ji ltar bdag
14a2('bum): bdag ces bya ba yang de ni thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad myed cing myi dmyigs pa/ de bzhin du phyi nang gyi chos rnams la yang 'du shes bskyed de/ de ltar bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes
14a3('bum): myi bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la chos gang la yang myi len myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma skyes pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa yod par myi 'dod na/
14a4('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par myi 'dod de/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa 'am/ 'thob par bya ba myed do/ /smras pa/
14a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis chos skyes pa 'thob pa dang / 'thob par bya bar 'dod dam/ 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
14a6('bum): bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par myi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par myi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na 'thob pa myed la mngon par rtogs pa myed dam/
14a7('bum): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob pa yang yod/ mngon par rtogs yang yod de/ gnyis kyis ma yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob pa 'am mngon par
14a8('bum): rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/
14b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyis tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/ don dam pas ni 'thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/
14b2('bum): dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa myed do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i 'jig rten
14b3('bum): gyi tha snyad du yod pa/ de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs
14b4('bum): par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam par ni las kyang
14b5('bum): myed/ las kyi rnam par smyin pa yang myed/ skye ba yang myed/ 'gag pa yang myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang myed/ rnam par byang ba yang myed do/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i
14b6('bum): chos skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on tam skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar myi 'dod/ skyes pa'i chos
14b7('bum): kyang skye bar myi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar myi 'dod pa gang yin// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/
14b8('bum): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong
15a1('bum): pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du shes ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed ma skyes pa rang
15a2('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig ma skyes pa rang
15a3('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis
15a4('bum): stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
15a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
15a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sgra ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dri ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
15a7('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni ro ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
15a8('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
15b1('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
15b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin
15b3('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi
15b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan
15b5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar
15b6('bum): myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang
15b7('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
15b8('bum): bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong
16a1('bum): pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
16a2('bum): bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis
16a3('bum): stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sa'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chu'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin
16a4('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mye'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rlung gi khams ma skyes pa
16a5('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni nam mkha'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par
16a6('bum): shes pa'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma rig pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
16a7('bum): bdag ni 'du byed ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
16a8('bum): bdag ni mying dang gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye mched drug ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
16b1('bum): bdag ni reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sred
16b2('bum): pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni len pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni srid pa ma skyes
16b3('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rga shi ma skyes pa rang bzhin
16b4('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshul khrims
16b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa' ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
16b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa
16b7('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni
16b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
17a1('bum): bu/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi
17a2('bum): 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin
17a3('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
17a4('bum): ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni
17a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha
17a6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
17a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
17a8('bum): skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin
17b1('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma skyes pa rang
17b2('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi
17b3('bum): rkang pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dbang po rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag
17b4('bum): ni stobs rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
17b5('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
17b6('bum): skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshad myed pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis
17b7('bum): stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar
17b8('bum): pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan
18a1('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
18a2('bum): bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
18a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma skyes pa
18a4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni
18a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byams pa chen po ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
18a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni snying rje chen po ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma skyes pa rang
18a7('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lan
18a8('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
18b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang byang chub ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
18b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma skyes pa
18b3('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos skyes pa skye bar myi 'dod pa gang / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar
18b4('bum): myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du shes skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
18b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
18b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
18b7('bum): bu/ bdag ni sna skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus
18b8('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin
19a1('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sgra skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dri skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
19a2('bum): skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ro skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
19a3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
19a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye
19a5('bum): bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang
19a6('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi 'dus te
19a7('bum): reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni
19a8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha
19b1('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa' skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod
19b2('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
19b3('bum): kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
19b4('bum): bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin
19b5('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni
19b6('bum): sa'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chu'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag
19b7('bum): ni mye'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rlung gi khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
19b8('bum): bdag ni nam mkha'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan
20a1('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma rig pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
20a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mying dang gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
20a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye mched drug skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
20a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sred pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan
20a5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni len pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
20a6('bum): bdag ni rga shi skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
20a7('bum): bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
20a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa skyes pa rang
20b1('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid
20b2('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid skyes
20b3('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid
20b4('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid
20b5('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mtha' las
20b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
20b7('bum): bu/ bdag ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan
20b8('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar
21a1('bum): myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
21a2('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po
21a3('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
21a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin
21a5('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dbang po rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stobs rnams
21a6('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
21a7('bum): bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis
21a8('bum): stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshad myed pa rnams
21b1('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
21b2('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong
21b3('bum): pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni
21b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
21b5('bum): bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
21b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar
21b7('bum): myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byams pa chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni snying rje chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /
21b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin
22a1('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyir
22a2('bum): myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
22a3('bum): bdag ni rang byang chub skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
22a4('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor skye ba skye 'am/ 'on tam myi skye ba skye/ smras pa/
22a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba yang myi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba myed pa'i grangs su gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang
22a6('bum): ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bltar myed pa thogs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam grangs des na skye ba
22a7('bum): yang myi skye myi skye ba yang myi skye'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa rnams
22a8('bum): kyi skye ba myed pa la'ang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs so zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang
22b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya ba brjod pa la bdag gis spobs pa myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba myed pa yang bdag gis ni
22b2('bum): brjod par yang spobs pa myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang
22b3('bum): yin pa dang / myi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bltar myed pa thogs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid
22b4('bum): gcig pa dag go/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa ni skye ba myed ces bya ba yin te/ spobs pa yang skye ba myed la chos kyang skye ba myed de/ gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de
22b5('bum): dag kyang skye ba myed pa yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni ma skyes pa'o/ /spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o/ /chos ni ma skyes pa'o/ /gang las brtsams
22b6('bum): te smra bar spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang ma skyes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs skye ba myed do/ /tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /'du shes skye ba myed do/ /'du byed skye
22b7('bum): ba myed do/ /rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /myig skye ba myed do/ /rna ba skye ba myed do/ /sna skye ba myed do/ /lce skye ba myed do/ /lus skye ba myed do/ /yid skye ba myed do/ /gzugs skye ba myed do/ /sgra skye
22b8('bum): ba myed do/ /dri skye ba myed do/ /ro skye ba myed do/ /reg skye ba myed do/ /chos skye ba myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /
23a1('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
23a2('bum): skye ba myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
23a3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /lus kyi
23a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /sa'i khams skye ba myed do/ /chu'i khams skye ba myed do/ /mye'i khams skye ba myed do/ /rlung gi
23a5('bum): khams skye ba myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams skye ba myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba myed do/ /ma rig pa skye ba myed do/ /'du byed skye ba myed do/ /rnam par shes pa skye ba myed do/ /mying dang gzugs skye ba myed
23a6('bum): do/ /skye mched drug skye ba myed do/ /reg pa skye ba myed do/ /tshor ba skye ba myed do/ /sred pa skye ba myed do/ /len pa skye ba myed do/ /srid pa skye ba myed do/ /skye ba skye ba myed do/ /rga shi skye ba myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
23a7('bum): phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed do/ /
