182b8('bum): rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dag rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar zab pa/ de ltar brtag tu myi rung ba/ de ltar brtag tu myi rung ba'i spyod yul/ de ltar phra ba/ de ltar
183a1('bum): gsal ba/ de ltar blta dka' ba/ de ltar rtogs par dka' ba/ de ltar zhi ba/ de ltar bzang ba/ de ltar shin tu 'phags pa/ de ltar mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba/ de la yid ches
183a2('bum): par byed pa su yang myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di la yid ches pa chos gang yang ma brjod ma bshad do/ /ji ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma brjod ma bshad pa de bzhin du/ 'di la sems
183a3('bum): can gang yang yid ches par byed pa myed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
183a4('bum): las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang / rgya cher rnam par bkod dam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
183a5('bum): chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba yang ma bstan tam/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
183a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
183a7('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
183a8('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
183b1('bum): dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
183b2('bum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
183b3('bum): pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
183b4('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
183b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag
183b6('bum): kyang bstan tam/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par brtse ba rnams kyang bstan tam/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
183b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes myi bya 'am/ des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhes
183b8('bum): myi bya 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang /
184a1('bum): phud dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhes myi bya 'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang
184a2('bum): thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro zhes myi bya 'am/ 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu
184a3('bum): mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro zhes myi bya 'am/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs
184a4('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur zhes
184a5('bum): myi bya 'am/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa
184a6('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba yang
184a7('bum): bstan/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod
184a8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
184b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
184b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
184b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
184b4('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam
184b5('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i
184b6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
184b7('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
184b8('bum): chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te
185a1('bum): skye bar yang 'gyur ro/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i
185a2('bum): rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum
185a3('bum): tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /
185a4('bum): 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par yang 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad
185a5('bum): pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams
185a6('bum): cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis zhe na/ bdag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sems can myi
185a7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / srog myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'gro ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gso' ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skyes bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gang zag myi dmyigs
185a8('bum): pa'i tshul dang / shes can myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / shed bdag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / byed pa po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / shes pa po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
185b1('bum): dang / mthong ba po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa'i
185b2('bum): tshul dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
185b3('bum): lus myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ro myi dmyigs pa'i
185b4('bum): tshul dang / reg myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i
185b5('bum): rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs
185b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
185b7('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
185b8('bum): dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi
186a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
186a2('bum): sa'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mye'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs
186a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
186a4('bum): mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
186a5('bum): len pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
186a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam
186a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
186a8('bum): dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
186b1('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
186b2('bum): stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang
186b3('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
186b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu
186b5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
186b6('bum): lam myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
186b7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs
186b8('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge
187a1('bum): 'dzin rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs gyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi 'jigs
187a2('bum): pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
187a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams
187a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
187a5('bum): ci'i phyir na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan/ ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba bstan/
187a6('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
187a7('bum): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
187a8('bum): pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
187b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong
187b2('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu
187b3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan
187b4('bum): bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i
187b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
187b6('bum): stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ni
187b7('bum): ci'i phyir bstan/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan cing / des na byang chub sems
187b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du 'gyur
188a1('bum): ba yin/ ci'i phyir na des sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud
188a2('bum): du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
188a3('bum): par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na byang
188a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs
188a5('bum): pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
188a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /phyi stong
188a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
188a8('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i
188b1('bum): tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
188b2('bum): theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs
188b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs
188b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i
188b5('bum): tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs
188b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi
188b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po skyed pa nas
188b8('bum): sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
189a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
189a2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
189a3('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
189a4('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
189a5('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa
189a6('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
189a7('bum): smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
189a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
189b1('bum): rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
189b2('bum): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can tu yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing /
189b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
189b4('bum): kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par
189b5('bum): myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs
189b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don
189b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing / khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
189b8('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
190a1('bum): phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
190a2('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
190a3('bum): nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
190a4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
190a5('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang /
190a6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
190a7('bum): smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
190a8('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /
190b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon
190b2('bum): par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la
190b3('bum): rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phud dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
190b4('bum): las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu
190b5('bum): mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag
190b6('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang
190b7('bum): yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub
190b8('bum): sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan
191a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
191a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
191a3('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
191a4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
191a5('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
191a6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
191a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub
191a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
191b1('bum): spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
191b2('bum): gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phud dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /
191b3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa
191b4('bum): myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs
191b5('bum): pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i
191b6('bum): spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi
191b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan
191b8('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
192a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
192a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
192a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
192a4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
192a5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
192a6('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
192a7('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/
192a8('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang
192b1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phud dud du bya ba dang /
192b2('bum): mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma
192b3('bum): gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
192b4('bum): dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /

192b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/
192b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi
192b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
193a1('bum): nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
193a2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par

193a7('bum): rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa
193a8('bum): myed pa'i chos can tu yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phud dud du bya ba dang / mchod

193b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa

193b4('bum): zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems

193b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus

193b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
194a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
194a2('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon

194a4('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par
194a5('bum): rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam
194a6('bum): pa myed pa'i chos can tu yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang /
194a7('bum): phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa
194a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
194b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /
194b2('bum): 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
194b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims
194b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa
194b5('bum): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
194b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs
194b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
194b8('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
195a1('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
195a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
195a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195a4('bum): chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can tu yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
195a5('bum): kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum
195a6('bum): tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam
195a7('bum): par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i
195a8('bum): spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs
195b1('bum): pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub
195b2('bum): sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind
195b3('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
195b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
195b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong
195b6('bum): ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam
195b7('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
195b8('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
196a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par
196a2('bum): shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes
196a3('bum): pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir
196a4('bum): bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams
196a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
196a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i
196a7('bum): spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
196a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
196b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
196b2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed
196b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
196b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
196b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
196b6('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
196b7('bum): stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa'
196b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstand te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes
197a1('bum): bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la/ yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de gang gis sangs rgyas
197a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
197a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed
197a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang /
197a5('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang
197a6('bum): yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang
197a7('bum): chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam
197a8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
197b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
197b2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
197b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
197b4('bum): dang / byang chub gyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
197b5('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang /
197b6('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
197b7('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
197b8('bum): gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon
198a1('bum): par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
198a2('bum): 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
198a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed
198a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs
198a5('bum): pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs
198a6('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed
198a7('bum): pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang /
198a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
198b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
198b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i
198b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub gyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
198b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar par brgyad dang /
198b5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
198b6('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
198b7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems
198b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /
199a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang mchod
199a2('bum): par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur
199a3('bum): gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
199a4('bum): de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
199a5('bum): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba
199a6('bum): bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang /
199a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
199a8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
199b1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
199b2('bum): dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
199b3('bum): bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
199b4('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas
199b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
199b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
199b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang
199b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du
200a1('bum): yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang /
200a2('bum): phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad
200a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang
200a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs
200a5('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
200a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems
200a7('bum): dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu
200a8('bum): phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
200b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
200b2('bum): nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
200b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
200b4('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
200b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
200b6('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
200b7('bum): myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi
200b8('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /
201a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ /des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na
201a2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim
201a3('bum): gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang
201a4('bum): thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur
201a5('bum): ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs
201a6('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid
201a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i
201a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes
201b1('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
201b2('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
201b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran
201b4('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
201b5('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
201b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
201b7('bum): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
201b8('bum): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa'

202a5('bum): dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /

202b4('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

202b6('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
202b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202b8('bum): chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas gyi zhing nas
203a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i
203a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur

203a6('bum): to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
203a7('bum): rold tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
203a8('bum): nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
203b1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
203b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
203b3('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /

203b6('bum): brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
203b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi
203b8('bum): zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs

204a4('bum): zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi

204a6('bum): gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
204a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
204a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
