253a5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/
253a6('bum): ci'i phyir na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya
253a7('bum): ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
253a8('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ sa'i khams
253b1('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ chu'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ mye'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang
253b2('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rlung gi khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ nam mkha'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya
253b3('bum): ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ ma rig pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir
253b4('bum): myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/
253b5('bum): ci'i phyir na/ mying dang gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ skye mched drug yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ reg
253b6('bum): pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ sred pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i
253b7('bum): phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ len pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ srid pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ skye ba yongs su
253b8('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rga shi yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya
254a1('bum): ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed
254a2('bum): par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba
254a3('bum): dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya
254a4('bum): ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i
254a5('bum): phyir na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ don dam pa stong
254a6('bum): pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs
254a7('bum): su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
254a8('bum): pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
254b1('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
254b2('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
254b3('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang / myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
254b4('bum): pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ yang dag par
254b5('bum): spong ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ dbang po rnams
254b6('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung ba dang
254b7('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang
254b8('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob
255a1('bum): pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed
255a2('bum): par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
255a3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/
255a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs
255a5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
255a6('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ byams pa chen po yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ snying rje chen po yongs su gzung ba dang myed
255a7('bum): par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su
255a8('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
255b1('bum): 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rang byang chub yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya
255b2('bum): ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang / myed par bya ba'i
255b3('bum): phyir myi slob pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /
255b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshor ba la tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du shes la
255b5('bum): 'du shes yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du byed la 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa la yongs su
255b6('bum): 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar myig la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig la myig yongs su myi 'dzin
255b7('bum): to/ /de ni 'di ltar rna ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba la rna ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar sna la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna la
255b8('bum): sna yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar lce la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce la lce yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar lus la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa
256a1('bum): nyid kyi phyir lus la lus yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar yid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la yid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar gzugs
256a2('bum): la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar sgra la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sgra la sgra yongs su myi
256a3('bum): 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar dri la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dri la dri yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar ro la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro la ro yongs su
256a4('bum): myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar reg la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir reg la reg yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar chos la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos
256a5('bum): la chos yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig gi rnam par shes pa la myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni
256a6('bum): 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa la
256a7('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa
256a8('bum): nyid kyi phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus kyi rnam par shes
256b1('bum): pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam
256b2('bum): par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /
256b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa la
256b4('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa
256b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus kyi 'dus te
256b6('bum): reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus
256b7('bum): te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myig
256b8('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
257a1('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
257a2('bum): kyi phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/
257a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la
257a4('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te
257a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni
257a6('bum): 'di ltar sa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa'i khams la sa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong
257a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir chu'i khams la chu'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar mye'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mye'i khams la mye'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /
257a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/
257b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par
257b2('bum): shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ma rig pa la ma rig pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /
257b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du byed la 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa
257b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar mying dang gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mying dang gzugs la mying dang
257b5('bum): gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ skye mched drug la skye mched drug yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar reg pa la yongs
257b6('bum): su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ reg pa la reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshor ba la tshor ba yongs su myi
257b7('bum): 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar sred pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sred pa la sred pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar len pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa
257b8('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ len pa la len pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar srid pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ srid pa la srid pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar skye ba
258a1('bum): la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ skye ba la skye ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar rga shi la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rga shi la rga shi
258a2('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /
258a3('bum): de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /
258a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar
258a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar
258a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di
258a7('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar nang
258a8('bum): stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
258b1('bum): kyi phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs
258b2('bum): su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar
258b3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su
258b4('bum): 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang
258b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'dus ma
258b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
258b7('bum): nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
258b8('bum): nyid la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dor ba
259a1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su
259a2('bum): myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /
259a3('bum): de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar
259a4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong
259a5('bum): pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin
259a6('bum): pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang
259a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/
259a8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang
259b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
259b2('bum): kyi phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dbang po rnams
259b3('bum): la dbang po rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ stobs rnams la stobs rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /
259b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni
259b5('bum): 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
259b6('bum): pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
259b7('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di
259b8('bum): ltar tshad myed pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshad myed pa rnams la tshad myed pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
260a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs
260a2('bum): su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di
260a3('bum): ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mthar kyis gnas
260a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa
260a5('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di
260a6('bum): ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin
260a7('bum): rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/
260a8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong
260b1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi
260b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
260b3('bum): phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
260b4('bum): byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po yongs su myi 'dzin
260b5('bum): to/ /de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
260b6('bum): rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ thams cad shes pa nyid la thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin
260b7('bum): to/ /de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /de ni 'di
260b8('bum): ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to/ /
261a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
261a2('bum): du byung ngo / /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
261a3('bum): nyid du 'byung ba yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs
261a4('bum): shing / chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
261a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / myed par bya ba'i phyir bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang
261a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong /
261a7('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
261a8('bum): ltar gzugs gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par
261b1('bum): byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
261b2('bum): 'du shes kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong /
261b3('bum): 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du shes 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba
261b4('bum): myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir
261b5('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du byed 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon
261b6('bum): mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa rnam par
261b7('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang
261b8('bum): ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig myig gi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
262a1('bum): rna ba'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba
262a2('bum): myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba rna ba'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang
262a3('bum): ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i
262a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna sna'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong /
262a5('bum): rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce lce'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs
262a6('bum): so/ /lus kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi
262a7('bum): mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus lus kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong /
262a8('bum): blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong
262b1('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid yid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas
262b2('bum): nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs
262b3('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sgra'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang
262b4('bum): ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sgra sgra'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
262b5('bum): dri'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong /
262b6('bum): 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri dri'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ro'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi
262b7('bum): mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
262b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar ro ro'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /reg gi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam
263a1('bum): par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar reg reg gi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi
263a2('bum): dmyigs so/ /chos kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong /
263a3('bum): 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos chos kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba
263a4('bum): myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi
263a5('bum): mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye
263a6('bum): ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong /
263a7('bum): 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par
263a8('bum): shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi
263b1('bum): mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i
263b2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri
263b3('bum): ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus
263b4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong /
263b5('bum): 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
263b6('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi

263b8('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong /

268b8('bum): pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba

273a8('bum): myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
273b1('bum): nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong /

273b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / blang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / stsogs
273b4('bum): pa myed pa dang / 'bri ba myed pa dang / 'grib pa myed pa dang / 'phel ba myed pa'i phyir myi slob myi 'byung ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
273b5('bum): du 'byung ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab
273b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ lha'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab 'byor kyi le'u las
273b7('bum): btsal bar bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa'
273b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab 'byor kyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o zhes smras te/ de ni khyod kyi mthu'o/ /khyod kyi byin kyi rlabs so/ /rab 'byor kyis smras
274a1('bum): pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di ni bdag gi mthu ma yin/ 'di ni bdag gi byin kyi rlabs ma yin no/ /brgya byin kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'o na su'i mthu/ de su'i byin kyi rlabs/ rab 'byor
274a2('bum): kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad byin kyi rlabs myed
274a3('bum): na de ci'i phyir/ de skad du de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs so/ /zhes smra/ byin kyi rlabs myed pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs
274a4('bum): pa yod par myi dmyigs la/ de bzhin nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ byin kyi rlabs
274a5('bum): myed pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par myi dmyigs la/ de bzhin nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par myi dmyigs so/ /byin kyi rlabs myed pa'i chos
274a6('bum): nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang byin kyi rlabs myed pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /
274a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi
274a8('bum): dmyigs so/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang gzugs kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la'ang
274b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
274b2('bum): pa la'ang tshor ba'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'du

274b4('bum): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang 'du byed kyi chos nyid

274b6('bum): pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs
274b7('bum): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang myig gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang myig gi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /

279a5('bum): nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang len pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
279a6('bum): gshegs pa la 'ang srid pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang srid pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba'i
279a7('bum): de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang skye ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
279a8('bum): gshegs pa la 'ang skye ba'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rga shi'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /
279b1('bum): rga shi'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rga shi'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs
279b2('bum): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang sbyin pa'i
279b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
279b4('bum): de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs
279b5('bum): so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
279b6('bum): chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin
279b7('bum): gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs
279b8('bum): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
280a1('bum): gshegs pa la 'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
280a2('bum): pa la 'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang shes
280a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
280a4('bum): chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
280a5('bum): la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
280a6('bum): gshegs pa la 'ang phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs
280a7('bum): so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang
280a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /
280b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang stong pa
280b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs
280b3('bum): so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
280b4('bum): la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
280b5('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
280b6('bum): gshegs pa la 'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang 'dus
280b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
280b8('bum): nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las
281a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das
281a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
281a3('bum): de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
281a4('bum): la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs
281a5('bum): pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
281a6('bum): gshegs pa la 'ang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rang bzhin stong
281a7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /
281a8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid gyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad
281b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
281b2('bum): la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
281b3('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
281b4('bum): gshegs pa la 'ang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang myi dmyigs
281b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
281b6('bum): de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi
281b7('bum): dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa
281b8('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la
282a1('bum): 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos
282a2('bum): nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
282a3('bum): stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid myi
282a4('bum): dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba'i
282a5('bum): de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/
282a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang yang dag par spong ba'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rdzu 'phrul
282a7('bum): gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /
282a8('bum): dbang po'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang dbang po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi
282b1('bum): dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang dbang po'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /stobs kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang stobs kyi de bzhin
282b2('bum): nyid myi dmyigs so/ /stobs kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang stobs kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid
282b3('bum): la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs
282b4('bum): pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs
282b5('bum): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs
282b6('bum): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
282b7('bum): gshegs pa la 'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang 'phags
282b8('bum): pa'i bden pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /
283a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang bsam gtan gyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin
283a2('bum): gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la
283a3('bum): 'ang tshad myed pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
283a4('bum): par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
283a5('bum): par 'jug pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par
283a6('bum): thar pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang
283a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid
283a8('bum): la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
283b1('bum): smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs
283b2('bum): so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
283b3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin
283b4('bum): nyid myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin kyi de bzhin nyid
283b5('bum): la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang ting nge 'dzin kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
283b6('bum): pa la 'ang ting nge 'dzin kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /
283b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang gzungs kyi sgo'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang
283b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin
284a1('bum): gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /
284a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang myi 'jigs pa'i chos
284a3('bum): nyid myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /
284a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid
284a5('bum): la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /byams pa chen po'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi
284a6('bum): dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang byams pa chen po'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang
284a7('bum): snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /
284a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi
284b1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi
284b2('bum): de bzhin nyid la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'ang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid la 'ang de bzhin
